    Server core.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.blockingTaskExecutor(Executor blockingTaskExecutor)
      Sets the Executor dedicated to the execution of blocking tasks or invocations.
      <T extends Service<T_I,T_O>,T_I extends Request,T_O extends Response,R extends Service<R_I,R_O>,R_I extends Request,R_O extends Response>
      ServerBuilder      		 ServerBuilder.decorator(Function<T,R> decorator) 
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.defaultMaxRequestLength(long defaultMaxRequestLength)
      Sets the maximum allowed length of the content decoded at the session layer.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.defaultRequestTimeout(Duration defaultRequestTimeout)
      Sets the default timeout of a request.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.defaultRequestTimeoutMillis(long defaultRequestTimeoutMillis)
      Sets the default timeout of a request in milliseconds.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.defaultVirtualHost(VirtualHost defaultVirtualHost)
      Sets the default VirtualHost, which is used when no other VirtualHosts match the host name of a client request. e.g. the "Host" header in HTTP or host name in TLS SNI extension
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.gracefulShutdownTimeout(Duration quietPeriod, Duration timeout)
      Sets the amount of time to wait after calling Server.stop() for requests to go away before actually shutting down.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.gracefulShutdownTimeout(long quietPeriodMillis, long timeoutMillis)
      Sets the amount of time to wait after calling Server.stop() for requests to go away before actually shutting down.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.idleTimeout(Duration idleTimeout)
      Sets the idle timeout of a connection.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.idleTimeoutMillis(long idleTimeoutMillis)
      Sets the idle timeout of a connection in milliseconds.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.maxConnections(int maxConnections)
      Sets the maximum allowed number of open connections.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.maxPendingRequests(int maxPendingRequests)
      Sets the maximum allowed number of pending requests.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.numWorkers(int numWorkers)
      Sets the number of worker threads that performs socket I/O and runs Service.serve(ServiceRequestContext, Request).
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.port(InetSocketAddress localAddress, SessionProtocol protocol)
      Adds a new ServerPort that listens to the specified localAddress using the specified SessionProtocol.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.port(int port, SessionProtocol protocol)
      Adds a new ServerPort that listens to the specified port of all available network interfaces using the specified SessionProtocol.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.port(ServerPort port)
      Adds the specified ServerPort.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.service(PathMapping pathMapping, Service<?,?> service)
      Binds the specified Service at the specified PathMapping of the default VirtualHost.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.service(PathMapping pathMapping, Service<?,?> service, String loggerName)
      Binds the specified Service at the specified PathMapping of the default VirtualHost.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.serviceAt(String exactPath, Service<?,?> service)
      Binds the specified Service at the specified exact path of the default VirtualHost.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.serviceLoggerPrefix(String serviceLoggerPrefix)
      Sets the prefix of service logger names.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.serviceUnder(String pathPrefix, Service<?,?> service)
      Binds the specified Service under the specified directory of the default VirtualHost.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.sslContext(SessionProtocol protocol, File keyCertChainFile, File keyFile)
      Sets the SslContext of the default VirtualHost from the specified SessionProtocol, keyCertChainFile and cleartext keyFile.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.sslContext(SessionProtocol protocol, File keyCertChainFile, File keyFile, String keyPassword)
      Sets the SslContext of the default VirtualHost from the specified SessionProtocol, keyCertChainFile, keyFile and keyPassword.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.sslContext(SslContext sslContext)
      Sets the SslContext of the default VirtualHost.
      ServerBuilder ServerBuilder.virtualHost(VirtualHost virtualHost)
      Adds the name-based virtual host specified by VirtualHost.
